feed.title: Sonarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Sonarr: 4.0.5.1710
entry.content:
What's Changed

Changes

  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6722
  • Add dev container workspace by @joshka in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6715
  • Default/multi Language selection per indexer by @gauthier-th in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6703
  • Update CI dependencies by @Gauvino in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6725
  • Update action and add merge conflict labeler by @Gauvino in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6721
  • Fixed: Re-testing edited providers will forcibly test them by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6728
  • New: Parse releases with multiple Ukranian audio tracks by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6730
  • Fix merge conflict labeling by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6732
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6734
  • macOS tests now run on arm64 by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6761
  • Fix removing completed qBitorrent torrents that use inactive seeding time by @c4181 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6733
  • Fixed: Improve paths longer than 256 on Windows failing to hardlink by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6739
  • Bump SixLabors.ImageSharp to 3.1.4 by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6740
  • New: Validate that folders in paths don't start or end with a space by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6735
  • Bump frontend dependencies by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6749
  • New: added environment variable support for all options in config.xml by @sillock1 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6746
  • New: Add KRaLiMaRKo and BluDragon to release group parsing exceptions by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6753
  • Treat CorruptDatabaseException as a startup failure by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6754
  • Initially deselect 0 byte files on interactive import by @stevietv in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6760
  • Fixed: Retrying download on not suppressed HTTP errors by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6755
  • Fixed: Limit titles in task name to 10 series by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6756
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6775
  • Fix wrongly named field in TransmissionProxy by @mikabytes in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6750
  • New: config flag to disable log database by @sillock1 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6765
  • Forward X-Forwarded-Host header by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6766
  • Parameter binding for API requests by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6768
  • fix missing translation key by @stevietv in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6781
  • Fixed: History with unknown episode by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6785
  • New: Treat batch releases with total episode count as full season release by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6786
  • Fixed: Use of indexer flags for torrent release pushes by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6788
  • qBittorrent: support stoppedUP and stoppedDL states by @mickael9 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6747
  • Fixed: Initialize databases after app folder migrations by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6778
  • New: Blocklist Custom Filters by @stevietv in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6779
  • New: Dark theme for login screen by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6787
  • Fixed: Timezone issue with next/previous/last air dates by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6791
  • Fixed: Parsing long downloading/seeding values from Transmission by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6793
  • Use number input for seed ratio by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6794
  • New: Has Unmonitored Season filter for Series by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6796
  • New: Add Custom Format Score to file in Episode Details by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6797
  • New: Add series tags to Webhook and Notifiarr events by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6798
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6789
  • Partial Season Packs and Ambiguous Air Dates by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6803
  • Fixed: Text color for inputs on login page by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6807
  • Refactor PasswordInput to use type password by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6808
  • Fixed: Notifications with only On Rename enabled by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6809
  • New: Parse 480i Bluray/Remux as Bluray 480p by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6810
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6817
  • Implement equality checks for providers by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6724
  • New: Root folder exists validation for import lists by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6806
  • New: Include time for episode/season/series history by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6811
  • Bump Npgsql to 7.0.7 by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6818
  • Update the wanted section for missing and cutoff unmet by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6819
  • Fixed: Trimming slashes from UrlBase when using environment variable by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6825
  • Fixed: Queue and Calendar not loading by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6834
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6832
  • Fixed: Time for episodes airing today being blank by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6838
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6837
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6840
  • Bump version to 4.0.5 by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6845

New Contributors

  • @gauthier-th made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6703
  • @Gauvino made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6725
  • @c4181 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6733
  • @sillock1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6746
  • @mikabytes made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6750
  • @mickael9 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6747

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/compare/v4.0.4.1491...v4.0.5.1710

entry.title: New release for Sonarr: 4.0.6.1805
entry.content:
What's Changed

Changes

  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6846
  • Fix SDR Files Being Parsed As HLG by @yammes08 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6842
  • New: Genres and Images for Webhooks and Notifiarr by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6839
  • Fixed: Include full series title in episode search by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6844
  • Fixed: Manual Interaction Required with possible null series by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6850
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6853
  • New: Refresh cache for tracked queue on series add by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6849
  • Fixed: Ignore case for name validation in providers by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6857
  • Fixed: Skip invalid series paths during validation by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6855
  • Fixed: Improve error messaging if config file isn't formatted correctly by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6863
  • Ignore Grabbed from API docs by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6869
  • New: Add TMDB id support by @sundermann in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6867
  • Fixed: Adding series with unknown items in queue by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6874
  • Fixed: Importing from IMDb list by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6877
  • New: Ignore inaccessible folders with getting folders by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6879
  • New: Display stats for delete multiple series modal by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6880
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6891
  • New: Parse anime seasons with trailing number in title by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6888
  • New: Improve UI status when downloads cannot be imported automatically by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6889
  • Fixed: Exclude invalid releases from Newznab and Torznab parsers by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6892
  • New: Ability to select Plex Media Server from plex.tv by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6893
  • New: Ignore Deluge torrents without a title by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6894
  • Fixed: Prevent errors parsing releases in unexpected formats by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6897
  • Fixed: Reprocessing items that were previously blocked during importing by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6907
  • Fixed: Limit Queue maximum page size to 200 by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6904
  • Fixed: Don't use cleaned up release title for release title by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6911
  • Remove seriesTitle from EpisodeResource by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6912
  • Fixed: Use only trackable downloads in queue by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6919
  • Disable trim log database housekeeping task by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6920
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6916
  • Bump version to 4.0.6 by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6921

New Contributors

  • @sundermann made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6867

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/compare/v4.0.5.1710...v4.0.6.1805

entry.title: New release for Sonarr: 4.0.7.1863
entry.content:
What's Changed

Changes

  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6926
  • Fixed: Calculate custom formats after setting user-chosen attributes in manual import by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6909
  • Fixed: History with unknown series by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6924
  • New: Parse VFI as French by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6929
  • Fixed: Parsing of anime releases using standard numbering by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6928
  • Fixed destructuring null statistics for bulk delete series modal by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6934
  • Custom Import List improvements by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6914
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6942
  • New: Queued episode count for seasons in series details by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6936
  • New: 'On Import Complete' notification when all episodes in a release are imported by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6937
  • Fixed: Removing pending release without blocklisting by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6944
  • New: Custom colon replacement option by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6941
  • New: Update AutoTags on series update by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6938
  • Fixed: add non-numeric codec tags to SourceRegex in QualityParser by @martylukyy in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6943
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6951
  • Bump version to 4.0.7 by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6963

New Contributors

  • @martylukyy made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6943

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/compare/v4.0.6.1805...v4.0.7.1863

entry.title: New release for Sonarr: 4.0.8.1874
entry.content:
What's Changed

Changes

  • Rename 'On Upgrade' to 'On File Upgrade' by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6966
  • Fixed: Import queue not processing after incomplete import by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6969
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6970
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6972
  • Bump version to 4.0.8 by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6973

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/compare/v4.0.7.1863...v4.0.8.1874
